summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Forward Thrust Arterial Street and Highway Plan and Program; making determinations pursuant to King County Resolution 34569 that certain named projects set forth in Section 3 of said Resolution either have been substantially accomplished, have been provided for or have become impractical to substantially accomplish; abandoning certain projects which have become impractical to substantially accomplish; authorizing allocation of balances remaining in the Arterial Development Fund from such abandonments, interest earning, cost savings, and bond proceeds made available through accomplishment of projects, in whole or in part, with supplemental and matching moneys, to the accomplishment, completion, enlargement or additional development of other projects set forth or authorized in said Section 3.
